fixedOption.explain:
Overall Damage +2%
Light Damage +20

Atk. Increase +286.0% for every Shocked target (Max Stacks: 5)

[Thunder Force]
Attacks deliver Light attacks, depending on your Light Damage. (Cooldown: 1.5 sec.)
- 100 to below 150: Light Explosion
- 150 to below 250: Lightning
- 250 or more: Thunderstorm
- Inflicts 720, 920, or 1,480% of total Atk. Increase, respectively.
- Thunderstorm Shocks enemies for 15 sec. (Cooldown: 10 sec.)

Attack Speed +10%
Casting Speed +15%
Light Resistance +20
